sentences.en: A little garden in which to walk, and immensity in which to dream.
sentences.cn: 一院小小的园地供他盘桓, 一片浩阔的天空供他神游.

sentences.en: He often poses as a writer; he really doesn't know the immensity of heaven and earth.
sentences.cn: 他常以作家自居, 真不知天高地厚.

sentences.en: I believe that life is infinitesimally brief in relation to the immensity of eternity.
sentences.cn: 我相信一旦跟永恒所具有的那种广博深厚联系起来,人生只不过是极其短暂的一瞬.

sentences.en: Lost somewhere between immensity and eternity is our tiny planetary home, the Earth.
sentences.cn: 在浩瀚和永恒之间迷失的是我们渺小的行星家园, 地球.

sentences.en: The business is conducted on a scale of unprecedented immensity.
sentences.cn: 这项业务是按前所未有的巨大规模来经营的.

sentences.en: The immensity of the universe is difficult to grasp.
The sea is the immensity of wretchedness.

words.tran_cn: 巨大的，广大的；无边无际的；非常好的
极大地；无限地；广大地；庞大地

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize the great size of something, especially something that cannot be measured
